Module vpm.gui_prototype
Package vpm.gui_prototype.models.PetStuff

Interface IPet

All Known Implementing Classes:
Bird, Cat, Dog, Fish, Pet
public interface IPet
Interface representing the basic functionalities and properties of a Pet. This interface defines methods for getting and setting pet attributes, as well as actions that can be performed on a pet.

  • Method Summary
